title: ZBT #315: Kate And The Sausage Castle-A Journey
description:
We are proudly presented by AroborTech Tools! Go to ArborTechTools.com/Zero and use promo code "ZERO" for 25% off the world's best wood carving tools. ROUND 1: Kate went down to the ole Sausage castle and lived to tell about it. Buckle up because it’s quite the story. ROUND 2: The only U.S. soldier known to have escaped from enemy captivity in Africa, ran over 20 miles across the Sahara Desert in 120 degree heat to save his pals…. And in true military fashion he’s having trouble getting the military to recognize that even decades later. ROUND 3: New DoD advisor had some Marine either 1. Whoop his ass when he was a boot 2. Had a marine heavily kiss with tongue his girlfriend and as a result wants to get rid of our beloved Corps. ROUND 4: We have a few volunteers for firewatch this weekend. One is a thief going around Houston stealing items from disabled veterans vehicles during military balls and the other one is Kate Hudson. Song at the end is "99 Red Balloons" covered by Goldfinger!


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/ZeroBlog30
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
